long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it very easy to grab a site's Teleflora ID for members of the eflorist support team. You can copy the ID straight to the clipboard or use it to visit the site in another environment. There is also an input for you to place a teleflora ID and then visit the corresponding site in any environment.
